modName: Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix by testiger2
summary:
This mod aims to improve the strange vanilla idle for Sabrecats.
It shows just a simple standing with visable breathing movement.
descriptionHtml:
From original sources: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45495/
[color=grey]
[b]Description[/b]
---------------------
This mod aims to improve the strange vanilla idle (mt_idle) for Sabrecats. 
It shows just a simple standing with visable breathing movement.[/color]
[youtube]Ema1dlhPORE[/youtube]
I Fix it within some minutes  and done. It\'s quite \"static\" IMO especially the gesture. True that vanilla one is a bit \"strange but it looks \"live\".. I think might consider to \"mix\" some of them or remake it in the future

Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder (testiger2)
author: testiger2 - edited by xp32
